content.en: Urolithiasis prediction: Researchers are exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to predict various outcomes and conditions related to urolithiasis, or urinary stones. These algorithms, which include decision support models, radiomic models, and artificial intelligence-based classifiers, aim to assist in treatment success prediction, identification of infection stones, and even the need for surgical intervention. By analyzing clinical variables and CT radiomics, combined models are also being developed to predict specific types of urinary stones.
content.da: Urolithiasis forudsigelse: Forskere undersøger brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forudsige forskellige udfald og tilstande relateret til urolithiasis, eller urinvejssten. Disse algoritmer, som inkluderer beslutningsstøttemodeller, radiomic-modeller og kunstig intelligens-baserede klassifikatorer, sigter mod at hjælpe med forudsigelse af behandlingssucces, identifikation af infektionsten og endda behovet for kirurgisk indgreb. Ved at analysere kliniske variable og CT-radiomics, udvikles kombinerede modeller også til at forudsige specifikke typer af urinvejssten.
